amendment.description: To reauthorize and reform the Export-Import Bank of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2327 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 29. Record Vote Number: 256.

action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 2327 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 26. Record Vote Number: 254.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2327 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2327 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kirk to Amendment SA 2266. (consideration: CR S5671) To reauthorize and reform the Export-Import Bank of the United States.
